cause.description:
We're doing a global search, to find the right women for Eli Warden. The search consists of fat women, skinny women, hairy women, chineese, japaneese, black, white, brown, paki, cury, spanish, burnt toast WHATEVER! HE NEEDS.... A WOMEN!!
1. Eli is in desperate need of a women
2. Just look at him
cause.name: Find Eli a Women
